duties_responsibilities.duty: Create business relationships in competitive accounts selling CDK’s DRIVE bundled solution.
Grow new market share through conquest sales, selling to Franchise Dealers with 2 sites or less.
Work in conjunction with all channel partners to increase sales opportunities in CDK strategic products in conquest accounts.
Achieve annual assigned sales plan, working under guidance of Sales Leadership.
Use consultative solution selling to align client’s business needs with a solution.
Develop and manage a sales territory.
Self-driven, persistent, ambitious, and highly motivated.
